en.title: 2,000 Attend Presidential Director Jankij's Recognition Event! (1)
en.content:
Thailand Presidential Director Jankij held a special recognition event for the Presidential Directors in his group on Sunday 30th August 2009 at the Rama Garden Hotel, Bangkok. A capacity crowd of over 2000 committed leaders and members attended the sellout event.

FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting, Founder Director KS Lee, Presidential Director KC Phoon, Presidential Director Arthur Medina attended the event together with President of Center For Arts Foundation Philippines Jerome Vinarao, it's Director Stella Ignacio, 9 year old singing sensation Clark Gamul and his father. Other VIPs include 3 Star General ( Navy ) Banjung Kumechai and recent 4th runner up Miss Thailand Universe Katemolee.

It was a GREAT event full of energy and sharing by Paul Ting, KS Lee and the many Presidential Directors attending. Young Clark Gamul impressed the crowd with his beautiful rendition of Michael Jackson's "Ben" and "We Are The World". Clark, you make us proud!

During The Event FE's Hope For Children Donated a Total Of Baht 600,000 To The Following Charities:

- Baht 300,000 for Library, Hin Kong Withaya School Khon Kaen.
   
- Baht 200,000 to Sutasini Noi-in Foundation, Yasa Thorn.
   
- Baht 100,000 for Computers for Tung Pong Mitrapap School. Mae Hong Son.

Presidential Director Jankij, at last count, has 44 Presidential Directors in his group. That is amazing! He is targeting 100 Presidential Directors by year-end. Go for it, Jankij, we are sure you will achieve that and more!

A BIG THANK YOU to Presidential Director Jankij and his team for organizing the successful event.

Oh yes, congratulations too for the new Mercedes SLK 200 Compressor Open Top you just bought for your wife! If Presidential Director Jankij can do it, so can YOU! All you need is the same FOCUS, COMMITTMENT AND DETERMINATION. See you at the TOP!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
<Click Here For More Photos>

meta.author: klhunter
